name: RDC Analytics
overview:
RDC Analytics is a team of content analytics specialists that leverage a wide range of proprietary and best-of-breed tools and expertise to help clients analyze large volumes of unstructured (text-based) data.

We help clients lower cost and risk associated with investigating large volumes of data, quickly and with a high level of transparency and measurable quality assurance.

RDC Analytics has solutions for:

  • Case Assessment and Preparation
  • Advanced Keyword Development
  • Human-Based Review
  • Investigations
  • Business Intelligence

RDC Analytics’ parent company, RenewData, recognized these trends and began amassing the tools and expertise in 2009 to deliver the industry’s most complete content analytics consultancy.

In 2012 it launched a new division, RDC Analytics, to uniquely and exclusively focus on meeting the clear market need for content analytics consulting.
